description: This file defines data classes related to chess moves, including the Move class with move details and the UndoInfo class for storing previous game state information.

classes.name: Move
classes.description: Represents a chess move with source and destination squares, optional promotion piece, and flags for captures and special moves.

classes.name: UndoInfo
classes.description: Stores information needed to undo a move, including captured piece, castling rights, en passant status, move counters, and side to move.
